Headline: #62 Archer and #62H Archer/Harlem Temporary Reroute at Archer/Harlem
ShortDescription: 62 Archer and 62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Central, and Archer due to, street blockage at Archer/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer and #62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  via Archer, Austin, 55th, Central, and Archer due to, street blockage at Archer/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Reroute at Archer/Harlem
ShortDescription: 55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Austin, Archer, Central, and 55th, due to, street blockage at Archer/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Austin, Archer, Central, and 55th, due to, street blockage at Archer/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
